verses.verse: <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> to the chosen ones who are living as <S%G3927>foreigners<s%> in the Dispersion <S%G1290>in<s%> <S%G4195>Pontus,<s%> <S%G1053>Galatia,<s%> <S%G2587>Cappadocia,<s%> <S%G773>Asia,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1588>Bithynia,<s%>

according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4268>foreknowledge<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G38>sanctification<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G1519>that<s%> you may <S%G5218>obey<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G4473>sprinkled<s%> with his <S%G129>blood:<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> be <S%G4129>multiplied.<s%>

<S%G2128>Blessed<s%> be the <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2962>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> <S%G313>became<s%> <S%G2248>our<s%> father <S%G313>again<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> a <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%>

<S%G1519>to<s%> an <S%G862>incorruptible<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G283>undefiled<s%> <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> <S%G2532>that<s%> <S%G263>doesn't<s%> fade away, <S%G5083>reserved<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>Heaven<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%>

<S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> are <S%G5432>guarded<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> a <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G2092>ready<s%> to be <S%G601>revealed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2540>time.<s%>

<S%G1722>Wherein<s%> you greatly <S%G21>rejoice,<s%> though <S%G737>now<s%> for a little <S%G3641>while,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> need <S%G1163>be,<s%> you have <S%G2076>been<s%> put to <S%G3076>grief<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4164>various<s%> <S%G3986>trials,<s%>

<S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G1383>proof<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> which is <S%G4183>more<s%> <S%G5093>precious<s%> than <S%G5553>gold<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G622>perishes<s%> even <S%G1161>though<s%> it is <S%G1381>tested<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G4442>fire,<s%> may be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> result <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G1868>praise,<s%> <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G602>revelation<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>—

<S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1492>having<s%> <S%G1492>known<s%> you <S%G25>love;<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3739>whom,<s%> though <S%G737>now<s%> you <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G1161>him,<s%> yet <S%G4100>believing,<s%> you <S%G21>rejoice<s%> greatly with <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G412>unspeakable<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> full of <S%G1392>glory<s%> —
<S%G2865>receiving<s%> the <S%G5056>result<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> the <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G5590>of<s%> your <S%G5590>souls.<s%>

<S%G4012>Concerning<s%> <S%G3739>this<s%> <S%G4991>salvation,<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G1567>sought<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> searched <S%G1830>diligently,<s%> who <S%G4395>prophesied<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that would come <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%>

<S%G2045>searching<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> what kind <S%G4169>of<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1213>pointed<s%> <S%G4303>to,<s%> when he predicted the <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> <S%G1519>of<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1391>glories<s%> <S%G5023>that<s%> would follow <S%G3326>them.<s%>

To <S%G3739>them<s%> it was <S%G601>revealed,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> to <S%G2254>you,<s%> they <S%G1247>ministered<s%> these <S%G846>things,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> have <S%G312>been<s%> <S%G312>announced<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who preached the Good <S%G2097>News<s%> to <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> sent <S%G575>out<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven;<s%> which <S%G3739>things<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1937>desire<s%> to <S%G3879>look<s%> <S%G1519>into.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore,<s%> <S%G328>prepare<s%> <S%G3751><s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1271>minds<s%> for <S%G3525>action,<s%> be sober and set your <S%G1679>hope<s%> <S%G5049>fully<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that will be <S%G5342>brought<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G602>revelation<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>—

<S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G5218>obedience,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> conforming yourselves according <S%G4964>to<s%> your <S%G4386>former<s%> <S%G1939>lusts<s%> as <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G52>ignorance,<s%>

<S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>just<s%> <S%G2596>as<s%> he who <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> is <S%G40>holy,<s%> <S%G846>you<s%> yourselves also <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> of your <S%G391>behavior;<s%>
<S%G1360>because<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G1096>"You<s%> shall be <S%G40>holy;<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G40>holy.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> you call <S%G1941>on<s%> him as <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> without respect of <S%G678>persons<s%> <S%G2919>judges<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> each <S%G1538>man<s%>'s <S%G2041>work,<s%> <S%G390>pass<s%> the <S%G5550>time<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3940>living<s%> as foreigners here <S%G1722>in<s%> reverent <S%G5401>fear:<s%>

<S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> you <S%G3084>were<s%> <S%G3084>redeemed,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> with corruptible <S%G5349>things,<s%> with <S%G694>silver<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5553>gold,<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3152>useless<s%> way of <S%G391>life<s%> handed down from <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3970>fathers,<s%>
<S%G235>but<s%> with <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G5613>blood,<s%> as of a <S%G299>faultless<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G784>pure<s%> <S%G286>lamb,<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

who was <S%G4267>foreknown<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> was <S%G5319>revealed<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G2078>end<s%> of <S%G5550>times<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> your <S%G5209>sake,<s%>

<S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> are <S%G4100>believers<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1453><s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1391>glory;<s%> so <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> might <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Seeing you have <S%G48>purified<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5590>souls<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> your <S%G5218>obedience<s%> to the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> in <S%G505>sincere<s%> <S%G5360>brotherly<s%> <S%G25>affection,<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G2513>the<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G1619>fervently:<s%>

having been born <S%G313>again,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5349>corruptible<s%> <S%G4701>seed,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> of <S%G862>incorruptible,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> which <S%G2198>lives<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3306>remains<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165>forever.<s%>

<S%G1360>For,<s%> <S%G3956>"All<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> is <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G5528>grass,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%>'s <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G438>flower<s%> in the <S%G5528>grass.<s%> The <S%G5528>grass<s%> <S%G3583>withers,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>its<s%> <S%G438>flower<s%> <S%G1601>falls;<s%>

<S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>'s <S%G4487>word<s%> <S%G3306>endures<s%> <S%G1519>forever.<s%>" <S%G165><s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5124>This<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G4487>word<s%> of Good News <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G2097>preached<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%>
